articles.description: President Trump commented on Hurricane Dorian’s path toward Florida as he left the White House on his way to Camp David. The president acknowledged the threatening size of the storm and said he was working with FEMA to aid the affected areas.

articles.title: New technology helps gather critical hurricane intensity data
articles.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Association is using gliders that can stay at sea for months to gather potentially life-saving data on hurricane conditions and intensity.

articles.title: Florida braces for impact as Hurricane Dorian moves in
